queries.query: SELECT Service.ERPCommunicationComponent_ID, Service.ServiceType, EndPoint.ListenHost, EndPoint.ListenPort, EndPoint.AnswerHost, EndPoint.AnswerPort FROM Service FULL JOIN Service_To_EndPoint ON Service.ID =Service_To_EndPoint.Service_ID INNER JOIN EndPoint ON EndPoint.ID = Service_To_EndPoint.EndPoint_ID WHERE (Service.ERPCommunicationComponent_ID = @ERPCommunicationComponent_ID)
